name: kpi-productivity
description: Comprehensive productivity tracking system with security hardening and interactive documentation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:gateway && npm run build:docs
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:gateway
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../gateway && npm install && cd ../docs/interactive && npm install
scripts.security:audit:all: npm audit && cd backend && npm audit && cd ../frontend && npm audit && cd ../gateway && npm audit && cd ../docs/interactive && npm audit
scripts.deps:outdated: npm outdated; cd backend && npm outdated; cd ../frontend && npm outdated; cd ../gateway && npm outdated; cd ../docs/interactive && npm outdated

author: KPI Productivity Team
